titles.title: A bill to repeal certain sections of the Act of May 26, 1936, pertaining to the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
1/12/2007--Introduced.
Repeals specified provisions pertaining to real property taxation in the U.S. Virgin Islands. Makes such amendment effective on July 22, 1954.
